title: Disconnected due to a blue screen, still won my ranked game but lost lp?

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

replies.body: Since you were disconnected long enough for you to be counted as AFK, that match still counts as a loss even though your team pulled through and won. Since it counts as a loss for you, you lost LP.
